full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly, 

I've checked the coupon and it seems that it was expired. With that in mind, I have removed the expiration date for the coupon so you can use it indefinitely now.

Let me know if you need further assistance.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Sally,

That is strange.

The free discount code should be working.

I've copied in our IT team and they should be able to sort it out asap.

Shelly

From: shelly@dontsweatit.com.au <shelly@dontsweatit.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 12 October 2022 at 9:05 am
To: Sally Gebert <sally@gebert.com.au>, dan@westernhotel.com.au <dan@westernhotel.com.au>, emily@thevictoriawoodend.com.au <emily@thevictoriawoodend.com.au>, tom@francisvenues.com.au <tom@francisvenues.com.au>, rachel.checinski@ausvenueco.com.au <rachel.checinski@ausvenueco.com.au>
Cc: Kimberley Malcolm <k.malcolm@ahavic.com.au>, Caitlin Fraraccio <c.fraraccio@ahavic.com.au>, Alicia Galea <alicia@dontsweatit.com.au>
Subject: Don't Sweat It - Menopause in the workplace

Hi Sally, Dan, Emily, Tom and Rachel,

Shelly Horton here.

Caitlin Fraraccio and Kimba Malcolm suggested I give you a free login to do our course, Don't Sweat it, as AHA Vic is looking to promote it to their members.

Dr Ginni Mansberg and I created Don't Sweat It a one hour online course to make workplaces more perimenopause and menopause friendly.

In a nutshell, we think Don't Sweat It can help some of the staffing problems in hospitality.

Making your workplace menopause friendly makes business sense as it helps retain staff, reduce recruitment costs, decrease sick days, creates a culture of inclusivity, diversity and equality, is suitable for all genders and helps protect you from employment law issues.

Win bloody win!

So follow these instructions to do the course for free...

Please go through the main site https://dontsweatit.com.au/pricing/

Select Flying solo

Enter your details (you won't be charged but we need them as part of the process)

Then use DSI-SAMPLECOURSE for a 100% discount.

I've also attached some extra info about the course.

Dr Ginni and I would love your feedback.

Cheers

Shelly x

Shelly Horton
Co-Founder,
Don't Sweat It -
Menopause in the Workplace


Mobile: +61 404868463
Email: shelly@dontsweatit.com.au


http://dontsweatit.com.au/
